These *Quickstart* materials are intended to guide curators through the process of creating their own web application and formatting data for visualization in the browser.
The main vignettes in the Quickstart series include:

1. [Environment Setup](01_environment_setup.md)
2. [Installation](02_install.md)
3. [Data Curation](03_data_curation.md)
4. [Configuration](04_configuration.md)
5. [Browsing](05_browsing.md)

Please view the [vignettes directory of the GitHub repository](https://github.com/ergonyc/omicser/tree/main/vignettes)
for this project to view:
- R scripts used to curate and execute example datasets
- an example configuration file, `omicser_options.yml`
- placeholders for the organization of data and creation of the database files
